name: The Son of the First Emperor Kills Enemies and Becomes a God
author: 无量功德
content: Zhao Qi gets reborn to the warring period. At the time when the Qin emperor, Ying Zheng, started sweeping the 6 nations, and rule the world. Enlisting in the army Without hesitation, I didn’t expect once I start killing enemies I would level up the system! Slowly but surely, Zhao Qi became the commander for Da Qin’s army, when he saw emperor Qin he was immediately startled, he is actually the son of the emperor, Da Qin’s prince!
